belongs_to_collection.name: Up to and Including Her Limits Collection

original_title: Up to and Including Her Limits 2
overview: Chloe Cherry's escalating role-play scenarios with her boyfriend eventually lead out of fantasy and into real life when she poses as a prostitute and brings home a john. An agoraphobic seeks interaction in the unlikely company of a prostitute she keeps passing on the street in Exposure. Nicole Doshi wears a ring for her master. When he presents a second ring to her, she follows his orders with both obedience and trepidation in Second Ring. Jill Kassidy plays the inexperienced daughter of a powerful man--one who aches to prove herself in an act of rebellion in Doors. All find new limits, and then some.
title: Up to and Including Her Limits 2
